name: Peach Fizz
description: The Peach Fizz is a cocktail that goes down easy. Itâ€™s all about peach and lemon with a little bit of sweeteners and some soda water to liven it up.
directions: Rim a highball glass with sugar.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour in everything exept the soda.
Pour the mixture into a sugar-rimmed highball glass.
Top the rest of the way with soda.
